about_the_game:
This tileset was designed for people who desire adventure. The tiles that we diligently made will be ideal for a wide range of games. It is a collection that includes ready-made elements for villages, home environments, the outdoors, forests, small cities, and dungeons. There are over 300 elements! This is a whole graphic bundle for making a game.

This pack Includes:

* A set of terrain autotiles and tilesets that have been properly formatted and are ready to use!
* Various terrains - such as deserts, dungeons, interior floors, village, small cities the classic forest and hills!
* A collection of delightful house tiles, both exterior and interior, with a versatile set of basic ornaments to personalize your interiors!
* Tilesets + animations ready for RPG Maker
* Tilesets in 3 sizes (16x, 32x, 48x)
* Tiles count : ~966 (48x48)
* 8 fully animated characters
* 1 animated Slime
* 1 Animated Cow
* 1 Animated Snake
* 5 types of animated chest
* 6 animated doors
* 1 Airship
* More than 300 elements!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
